short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension provides the possibility of selecting nodes to remove or move them adapting the website to your needs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows removing unnecessary content from any website. Additionally, you can move nodes and reorganize the website to your need or desires. To avoid tab swithching, you can add content from different websites.
